configOptions.name: sections
configOptions.description: Configuration for a section to display on the patient registration screen. Format: list of { id, label, questions: [ { legend, fields:[] } ] }

configOptions.name: afterCreatedUrl
configOptions.description: What url to go to after successfully registering the patient. Supports {{patientId}}

configOptions.name: registrationEncounterType
configOptions.description: Encounter type of registration encounter (optional--if not specified, no registration encounter created)

configOptions.name: registrationEncounterRole
configOptions.description: Encounter role for provider of registration encounter (optional)

configOptions.name: allowRetrospectiveEntry
configOptions.description: True/false whether or not allow the registration encounter datetime to be backdated. Shows a datepicker for the registration encounter if encounter is configured, otherwise does nothing.
